input.sentences: the announcer asked everyone to get their projects together
and the terms were re explained before they began
the teams wrapped up last minute decisions
each seemed very knowledgeable with the info provided
and it was hard to choose the winner
output.sentences: AT THE NEW PROJECT MEETING, MEET OUR NEW ANNOUNCER
HE DID VERY WELL EXPLAINING ALL THE TERMS TO ALL OTHER PARTICIPANTS
WE WRAPPED UP IN TEAM FOR A MINUTE TO DISCUSS ALL ISSUES A BIT BETTER
AFTER THAT WE WERE ABLE TO PROVIDE KNOWLEDGEABLE INFO TO ALL OTHER PEOPLE IN THE MEETING.
AT THE END WE HAD TO CHOOSE A WINNER IT WAS A VERY HARD CHOICE
